value.0:
Use this widget to set a new target for the DMFI wands - mainly for distant players using the scroll bar or for .command skill checks or to set a target for the .appearance command.

2DA DATA Alphabetically for use with .appearance command.  USE ALL CAPS WHEN SETTING THE APPEARANCE.

An example:  Target your friend "Joe" with the targetting widget (or else the last target with any DMFI wand is affected) and then type:

.appearance ARANEA

That is it.  Here is a full list of options.

ARANEA
ALLIP
ARCH_TARGET
ARIBETH
ASABI_CHIEFTAIN
ASABI_SHAMAN
ASABI_WARRIOR
